_comment_pattern: This configuration demonstrates Pattern 1: Self-Contained Ontology. All properties (NCIt_Code, Preferred_Name, FULL_SYN, DEFINITION, etc.) are defined within the ctcae5.owl namespace itself. No external ontology references.
_comment_prefix_usage: NO prefixes used in property codes because all properties belong to ctcae5.owl namespace. No sparqlPrefix field needed - system uses default graph prefix template.
description: Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events
_comment_code: Local property from ctcae5.owl - unprefixed because it's in this ontology's namespace
_comment_synonymSource: Local qualifier property for synonym source
_comment_synonymTermType: Local qualifier property for synonym term type
_comment_definitionSource: Local qualifier property for definition source
_comment_sparqlPrefix: NO sparqlPrefix field - uses default prefix.graph template which generates: PREFIX :<http://ncicb.nci.nih.gov/xml/owl/EVS/ctcae5.owl#> PREFIX base:<http://ncicb.nci.nih.gov/xml/owl/EVS/ctcae5.owl#>
